sentences.en: A pebble lodged in his shoe.
sentences.cn: 一块鹅卵石进入他的鞋里.

sentences.en: And what I do is, I select a hard stone hammer, in this case a quartzite pebble about the size of a cricket ball, and I elect to hit it in one place - and this is where I start to knap.
sentences.cn: “现在你瞧瞧，这儿呢，我挑了块燧石，比较细长的，要削薄下来工作量并不大。” “我要做的就是，选择一块够硬的石锤，这次我选这块是个头有板球大小的石英岩卵石。

sentences.en: As the last Ice Age came to an end, somebody picked a pebble out of a small river not far from Bethlehem.
sentences.cn: 随着最后一个冰河时代宣告结束，有人从伯利恒附近流水淙淙的小溪边，捡起了一枚鹅卵石。

sentences.en: He fitted a pebble into the catapult and pulled back the elastic. Twang!
sentences.cn: 他把石子放进弹弓里，然后往回拉动橡皮筋。“嘣”！
它那双前爪紧紧抓住了一块小石子.

sentences.en: She moaned as a sharp pebble cut into her blistered foot.
sentences.cn: 一颗尖石子扎破了她脚上的血泡,她痛得叫了一声.

sentences.en: The beach was covered with smooth white pebbles.
sentences.cn: 海滩上布满了光滑的白色卵石。

sentences.en: The bird mistook the pebble for egg and tried to hatch it.
sentences.cn: 这只鸟错把卵石当蛋,想去孵它.

sentences.en: The boy gave the bully a pelt on the back with a pebble.
sentences.cn: 那男孩用石子掷击小流氓的背脊.

sentences.en: The words hit June like a pebble, in the ribs.
sentences.cn: 这些话就象鹅孵石一样打中琼的胸膛.

sentences.en: Then he squeezed the trigger and the pebble spattered.
sentences.cn: 他赶快把扳机一扣,啪的一声,石子击了个粉碎.

sentences.en: These particles range from coarse silt to sand or pebble size.
sentences.cn: 这些颗粒的大小变化范围是从粗粉砂级到砂级或细砂级.

sentences.en: They lean on the rail and toss a pebble into the falls, or a leaf.
sentences.cn: 他们凭着桥栏,把一粒鹅卵石或一片树叶投在瀑布里.

sentences.en: They may have used pebbles to calculate, for the word " calculus " means " pebble ".
sentences.cn: 他们也许是用石子来作计算的, 因“calculus ” 这个字原意是 “ 石子 ”.

sentences.en: We are going to pebble the walks in the park.
sentences.cn: 我们将用鹅卵石铺公园里的走道.

sentences.en: Who do you think you are? You are not the only pebble on the beach!
sentences.cn: 你认为自己是什么人? 你并非是必不可少的人.

sentences.en: You aren't the only pebble on the beach.
You throw a pebble in a pool and it ripples.
sentences.cn: 往池塘里扔块鹅卵石就会激起一片涟漪。

words.tran_cn: 多卵石的；有卵石花纹的

phrases.phrase: not the only pebble on the beach

trans.tran_cn: 卵石，水晶，水晶透镜，卵石花纹
trans.tran_en: a small smooth stone found especially on a beach or on the bottom of a river
